name: Lost and Found RPG
description:
"Lost & Found RPG" is a interesing and simple rpg horror game.

The protagonist is boy who is only five and lives with his grandmother in a lonely and tiny house. He is really bored usually and doesn't have much hobbies, his only hobbie is studying and observing nature and petting and spending time with a grey rabbit that lives near his window.

Peter's life has always been very boring and monotonous, perhaps too much for a boy so young, as if he were older than he really is.
But it is clear that he has always had a safe life, that security is over when he begins to investigate the death of his father and leaves that monotonous life to face great dangers.
With two possible endings, you will have to solve the mystery and end your monotonous life.

What to expect:

-Game full of mysteries and easter eggs.

-Two possible finals.

-Horror rpg ambentation

-Good story and plot.

How to play:

-WASD to move.

-Space to interact.
